    PopulateDirectionalSensors(GridCell[,], int, int, int, Span<float>, int, int, int)

    Scans a square area and populates the neuron input outputs directly. Uses stackalloc to avoid heap allocations.

    ScanLocalArea(GridCell[,], int, int, int)

    Scans a square area around the center point and calculates the density of entities. Returns values between 0.0 (empty) and 1.0 (completely full).

    Declaration
    public static DensityResult ScanLocalArea(GridCell[,] gridMap, int centerX, int centerY, int radius)

    ScanSensors(GridCell[,], int, int, int, int, Span<float>, int, int, int, int, int, int, ref Agent, Agent[], out bool)

    Combined scan for both local area density (fixed radius) and directional sensors (variable radius). Optimizes performance by iterating the grid only once.

    Declaration
